definition: university city
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
to learn/to study/to imitate/science/-ology
city walls/city/town/CL:座[zuo4],道[dao4],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Let us have a look at New Jersey's pre-eminent University Town.
sentences.chinese: 让我们看看新泽西出类拔萃的大学城。

sentences.english: I am university student in Guangzhou Higher Education MegaCenter.
sentences.chinese: 我是广州大学城的一名大学生。

sentences.english: Where husky University City rent house is cheap under Hangzhou?
sentences.chinese: 杭州下沙大学城哪里租房便宜？

sentences.english: Austrian body west Zhongguancun, as well as Beijing's largest university town.
sentences.chinese: 奥体的西边是中关村，以及北京最大的大学城。

sentences.english: It'slike a small college town, everyone knows everybody.
sentences.chinese: 它就像一个大学城，每个人都互相认识。

sentences.english: Proceed to Coimbra, the University city, for overnight stay.
sentences.chinese: 前往科英布拉，大学城，过夜停留。

sentences.english: If you live in a college town you could think about hiring an intern.
sentences.chinese: 当你居住在大学城时，你可能会想雇佣一个实习医师。

sentences.english: Many of its satellite offices are located in college towns across the country.
sentences.chinese: 很多谷歌公司的卫星办公司都坐落在国内的大学城。

sentences.english: It is with the Chongqing university of college town exemple .
sentences.chinese: 以大学城的重庆大学为例。

sentences.english: With the rapid development of higher education in our country, the College-town has come into being.
sentences.chinese: 我国高等教育的跨跃式发展，催生了大学城。

sentences.english: This types of training mainly relys on network learning in World University City.
sentences.chinese: 这类培训主要是以依托世界大学城网络学习为主。

sentences.english: The total cost of building the whole college town will be 2.5 billion yuan.
sentences.chinese: 整座大学城的建成耗资25亿人民币。

sentences.english: Xiuke hair salon lies on Changzhou University Town.
sentences.chinese: 秀客美发店位于常州大学城附近。

sentences.english: Chongda Road West, University Town, Shapingba District, Chongqing 401331, P. R. C.
sentences.chinese: 中国重庆市沙坪坝区大学城重大西路。

sentences.english: The College-town is a kind of social phenomenon, and a brand-new organization system.
sentences.chinese: 大学城既是社会现象，又是一种全新的大学组织制度。

sentences.english: Mobile Univer-city makes the main concept of this design.
sentences.chinese: 可移动的大学城，这个设计的主要概念。
